snippet: Greece's economic crisis has prompted sometimes violent clashes between the police and protesters. To document the upheaval in his country, Angelos Tzortzinis has placed himself in the middle. Literally.
abstract: Greece's economic crisis has prompted sometimes violent clashes between the police and protesters. To document the upheaval in his country, Angelos Tzortzinis has placed himself in the middle. Literally.

headline.main: Standing Between the Police and Protesters
